p1: Experience an immersive campaign. As a guardian, you will discover lands of Adelia and destroy your foes with the power of elements.
p2: Lands of Adelia is being consumed by darkness coming from dungeons. Enter the dungeon gates with your party to fight the boss and claim your prize.

p3.text: There is so much to Guardians of Adelia, and we're still developing it! Take a look at guide to start playing or learn more:
